---
category: news
title: "Towards automatic detection of road features with deep learning"
excerpt: "While a vast amount of point cloud data has been accumulated for Japanese public works, it has little use in the unprocessed state. Researchers from Japan have now proposed a deep learning algorithm that uses high-precision 3D maps to automatically generate training data for constructing a road feature identification model from the point cloud data."
publishedDateTime: 2022-12-06T23:59:00Z
